subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Manny Ramírez eclipsed the Yankees’ Lou Gehrig on the career home run list with his 494th in the second inning, then added another homer in the third en route to the Red Sox’ victory.
snippet: Manny Ramírez eclipsed the Yankees’ Lou Gehrig on the career home run list with his 494th in the second inning, then added another homer in the third en route to the Red Sox’ victory.
